question.text: Christine came out of her last examination , feeling depressed . It was not the exam that made her feel that way , but the fact that it was the last one ; it meant the end of the school year . She dropped in at the coffee shop as usual , then went home early because there did n't seem to be anything else to do .
question.answer: Because she knew she had to go home at once .
Because the exams had not yet finished .
Because she had done badly in the exam .
Because the school year was now over .

question.text: She was not a brilliant student , she knew , but she was hard-working . Her professors always wrote things like `` A serious attempt '' and `` Well thought out but perhaps lacking in energy '' on her term papers ; they gave her Bs , the occasional B + . `` Is that you , dear ? ''
question.answer: She tried hard but was not unusually clever .

question.text: It was hard , anyway , to argue with her mother . She was so easily upset that it was better to avoid arguing with her . Christine felt , bitterly , that her mother had only a vague idea of what an exam was .

question.text: `` How was your exam , dear ? '' her mother asked . Christine came out of her last examination , feeling depressed .
